item.title: The Sims: Legacy Collection and The Sims 2: Legacy Collection announced for PC, now available
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/the-sims-legacy-collection-and-the-sims-2-legacy-collection-announced-for-pc-now-available

  • PC

The classic games you know and love.

Publisher Electronic Arts and developer Maxis have announced and released The Sims: Legacy Collection and The Sims 2: Legacy Collection for PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and EA App for $19.99 each. Both can also be purchased together for $39.99 via The Sims 25th Birthday Bundle.

Here is an overview of each collection, via Electronic Arts:

The Sims: Legacy Collection

  • Buy: Steam, Epic Games Store, EA App

The original game you know and love. For Windows 10 / Windows 11.

Create an entire neighborhood of Sims and run or ruin their lives. Help them pursue careers, make friends, and find romance — or see what happens when you let chaos unfold! Open-ended gameplay gives you the freedom to set your own goals and chart your Sims’ destinies. It is your neighborhood, and they are your Sims. Whether they prosper or perish is completely up to you.

The Sims: Legacy Collection includes:

  • The Sims
  • The Sims 4 Throwback Fit Kit
  • The Sims packs:
    • The Sims Livin’ Large
    • The Sims House Party
    • The Sims Hot Date
    • The Sims Vacation
    • The Sims Unleashed
    • The Sims Superstar
    • The Sims Makin’ Magic

The Sims 2: Legacy Collection

  • Buy: Steam, Epic Games Store, EA App

The game you know and love. For Windows 10 / Windows 11.

In The Sims 2, you direct your Sims over a lifetime and guide their characteristics from one generation to the next. You set your Sims’ goals in life: popularity, fortune, family, romance, or knowledge. Give them a long, successful existence, or leave their lives in shambles. Take them to extremes—from marrying an alien to writing a great novel or even seeing a ghost. What do you want to do with your Sims’ lives?

The Sims 2: Legacy Collection includes The Sims 2 and The Sims 4: Grunge Revival Kit, plus the following The Sims 2 packs: The Sims 2: University, The Sims 2: Nightlife, The Sims 2: Open for Business, The Sims 2: Pets, The Sims 2: Bon Voyage, The Sims 2: Seasons, The Sims 2: FreeTime, The Sims 2: Apartment Life, The Sims 2: Holiday Party Pack, The Sims 2: Family Fun Stuff, The Sims 2: Glamour Life Stuff, The Sims 2: Happy Holiday Stuff, The Sims 2: Celebration! Stuff, The Sims 2: H&M Fashion Stuff, The Sims 2: Teen Style Stuff, The Sims 2: Kitchen & Bath Interior Design Stuff, and The Sims 2: Mansion & Garden Stuff.

item.title: Okayu Nyumu! demo launches February 6 in Japan
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/okayu-nyumu-demo-launches-february-6-in-japan

  • PC
  • PS4
  • Switch

Full game due out on February 27.

A demo for romance visual novel Okayu Nyumu! will launch for PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC on February 6 in Japan, developer Entergram announced.

Digital pre-orders for the Switch and PC versions will also begin on the same date.

Weekly Famitsu Issue No. 1885, which is due out on February 6, will also have an 18-page cover story on Okayu Nyumu!.

Here is the game’s story synopsis:

Okayu Nyumu! is a pure romance visual novel starring and overseen by Hololive Virtual YouTuber Nekomata Okayu.

Become Okayu’s caretaker after she suddenly appears before you, and enjoy sweet, carefree days together.

This is a story about sharing smiles and heartfelt moments in daily life, while uncovering the truth behind Okayu and nurturing your love for her.

This game was created out of Nekomata Okayu’s desire to “live honestly,” so please make her the heroine of your story.

Okayu Nyumu! is due out for PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC on February 27 in Japan.

item.title: UNDYING coming to PS5, Xbox Series, and Switch on February 11 worldwide
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/undying-coming-to-ps5-xbox-series-and-switch-on-february-11-worldwide

  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Zombie survival game currently available for PC (and Switch in Japan).

Publisher Skystone Games and developer Vanimals will release PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and Switch versions of zombie survival game UNDYING on February 11 for $19.99 / £16.74 / €19.99 / 2,350 yen worldwide, the companies announced.

UNDYING first launched in Early Access for PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on October 19, 2021, followed by a full release on December 7, 2023. A Switch version launched on July 25, 2024 in Japan.

Here is an overview of the game, via Skystone Games:

About

Caught amid the zombie apocalypse and with time running out, Anling will stop at nothing to ensure her son, Cody, gets to safety. Enduring countless perils, including the zombie infection that’s beginning to take over her body, not to mention teaching Cody how to survive their harsh new reality.

As Anling and Cody explore the world they’ll come across an ensemble of characters that present unique challenges. How Anling and Cody handle each one determines their fates, some may die, some may live, and some may become staunch allies or even an archnemesis. Will humanity truly prevail?

Your Path, Your Choices, Your Story!

With everyone trying to survive, whether you help others or not can lead to devastating consequences. Everyone has their secrets, which begs the question… Who can you really trust? Every decision you make changes the outcome of your story, what will your ending look like?

Crafting 1.0 Means of Survival!

It’s not a survival game if there’s no crafting and now, with so many things to craft and enhance, it’s a wonder if there’ll even be enough resources!

How you use the crafting system will determine if you survive or not, and how easy it will be.

The World is filled with Dungeons, Stories, and loot!

Did you really think we wouldn’t have David Brevik (the godfather of Diablo) help design dungeons and make sure looting felt satisfying?

Each time you start a game of Undying, you’ll never know how the map will be laid out before your eyes. The 14 major locations will be spread across the map in a variety of layouts, while the other “”Unsafe Areas”” are filled with random events that can quickly alter your plans. Will you help an ungrateful survivor; what about a gang surrounded by zombies? You never know who you will encounter on your journey, each with their own tale to tell.
